t: North American Salt Company is Now Compass Minerals
s: January 10, 2018 - North American Salt Company is now Compass Minerals. As one of the world's largest salt companies, Compass Minerals produces millions of tons of salt and other minerals annually for snow and ice melting, animal nutrition, water conditioning, swimming pools, industrial and food applications.
